description: The Near East Crapemyrtle (Lagerstroemia indica 'Near East') is an amazing flowering shrub that's easy to maintain. It features spectacular flowers in a beautiful range of colors, like hot pink, violet, and pure white. The flower clusters and foliage of this plant can provide year-round interest, as the bright foliage turns to yellow and orange in the fall. Best of all, it's incredibly drought tolerant, so it doesn't need a lot of water once it's established. This means less time spent on irrigation, and more time watching your garden grow and thrive.
